name: Tympanic Timpanist
description:
Play as Otis in an epic battle through Middle Ear; brought to you by Otitis Media. Experience a world so loosely based on human anatomy it is scary. Brace yourself as you journey through the Stapes and avoid the Earwax in your path. Navigate the gale-force winds from the Eustachian Tube as you travel along the Incus. Traverse the Malleus and fight the horde of White Blood Cells that stand between you and your destiny – The Tympanic Temple.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys – Move
  • Right Click – Shoot
  • Left Click – Mask Up
  • Escape – Main Menu
